channel.title: Context Engineering Daily
channel.description: Daily news and research updates in AI Context Engineering, Prompt Engineering, RAG, and LLM development

item.title: Fair Play in the Newsroom: Actor-Based Filtering Gender Discrimination in Text Corpora
item.description: arXiv:2508.13169v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models are increasingly shaping digital communication, yet their outputs often reflect structural gender imbalances that originate from their training data. item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases.
